message:
SYSTEM: 3.RDF%28S%29.pdf: Página 9
• 9 
RDF Containers 
•  Describe groups of things 
•  A book was created by several authors 
•  A lesson is taught by several persons 
•  etc. 
•  RDF provides a container vocabulary 
•  rdf:Bag. Group of resources or literals, including duplicates, 
where order is not significant 
•  rdf:Seq. Group of resources or literals, including duplicates, 
where order is significant 
•  rdf:Alt. Group of resources or literals that are alternatives 
(typically for a single value of a property) 
17 
people:Raul 
      
properties:hasEmailAddress 
“rgarcia@fi.upm.es” 
rdf:_1 
“r.garcia@upm.es” 
rdf:_2 
rdf:Seq 
rdf:type 
RDF Collections 
•  Groups of things represented as a list structure 
•  “A container with limits” 
•  Constructed using rdf:List, rdf:first, rdf:rest, and 
rdf:nil
